com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Class TaskUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.TaskUtils

  • public final class TaskUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility methods for manipulating data in TaskInfos.

        Throws:

      • getTaskNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTaskNames(PodInstance podInstance)
        Returns all the Task names for a PodInstance.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance
        Returns:

      • getTaskNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTaskNames(PodInstance podInstance,
                                                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> tasksToLaunch)
        Returns all the task names for a pod, after filtering based on the passed in list of tasks to launch.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance
        tasksToLaunch - The names of TaskSpecs which should be launched.
        Returns:
        A list of the appropriate task names.

      • hasTasksWithTLS

        public static boolean hasTasksWithTLS(ServiceSpec serviceSpec)
        Returns whether any tasks within the provided ServiceSpec have transport encryption specs defined.

      • getPodTasks

        public static java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> getPodTasks(PodInstance podInstance,
                                                                java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks)
        Returns the TaskInfos associated with a PodInstance if its ever been launched. The list will be empty if the PodInstance has never been launched.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance to match against in the provided tasks
        tasks - All tasks in the StateStore
        Returns:
        TaskInfos associated with the PodInstance.

      • areEquivalent

        public static boolean areEquivalent(TaskInfo taskInfo,
                                    PodInstance podInstance)
        Returns whether the provided TaskInfo, representing a previously-launched task, is in the same provided pod provided in the PodInstance.

      • areDifferent

        public static boolean areDifferent(TaskSpec oldTaskSpec,
                                   TaskSpec newTaskSpec)
        Determines whether two TaskSpecs are different.
        Parameters:
        oldTaskSpec - The previous definition of a Task.
        newTaskSpec - The new definition of a Task.
        Returns:
        true if the Tasks are different, false otherwise.

      • volumesEqual

        public static boolean volumesEqual(TaskSpec first,
                                   TaskSpec second)
        Utility method for checking if volumes changed between the two provided TaskSpecs.
        Returns:
        whether the volume lists are equal

                                     java.lang.String taskName)
                              throws TaskException
        Gets the GoalState of Task.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - A PodInstance containing tasks.
        taskName - The name of the Task whose goal state is desired
        Returns:
        The GoalState of the task.
        Throws:
        TaskException - is thrown when unable to determine a task's GoalState

        public static java.util.List<PodInstanceRequirement> getPodRequirements(ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore,
                                                                        java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> allTaskInfos,
                                                                        java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskStatus> allTaskStatuses,
                                                                        java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> failedTasks,
                                                                        Backoff backOff)
        Given a list of all tasks and failed tasks, returns a list of tasks (via returned PodInstanceRequirement.getTasksToLaunch()) that should be relaunched.
        Parameters:
        failedTasks - tasks marked as needing recovery
        Returns:
        list of pods, each with contained named tasks to be relaunched

                                                                            java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskStatus> allTaskStatuses)
                                                                     throws TaskException
        Filters and returns all Protos.TaskInfos for tasks needing recovery.
        Returns:
        terminated TaskInfos
        Throws:
        TaskException

      • isRecoveryNeeded

        static boolean isRecoveryNeeded(Protos.TaskStatus taskStatus)
        Returns whether the provided Protos.TaskStatus shows that the task needs to recover.

        This assumes that the task is not supposed to be FINISHED.

      • getTasksForReplacement

        public static java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> getTasksForReplacement(java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskStatus> alltaskStatuses,
                                                                           java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> allTaskInfos)
        Marks the TaskInfo for replacement if the agent has been decommissioned.

      • isTerminal

        public static boolean isTerminal(Protos.TaskStatus taskStatus)
        Returns whether the provided Protos.TaskStatus has reached a terminal state.

      • getStepName

        public static java.lang.String getStepName(PodInstance podInstance,
                                           java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> tasksToLaunch)
        Returns a default name for a Step given a PodInstance and the tasks to be launched in it.
        Parameters:
        podInstance - The PodInstance to be launched by a Step.
        tasksToLaunch - The tasks to be launched in the Pod.
        Returns:
        The Step name

      • taskHasZone

        public static boolean taskHasZone(Protos.TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Determines if a task is launched in any zones.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - The TaskInfo to get zone information from.
        Returns:
